titles.title: Commending the Council for Chemical Research for publishing a new study, entitled "Measuring Up: Research & Development Counts in the Chemical Industry".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Science.

bill.summary: 6/7/2001--Introduced. Commends the Council for Chemical Research for publishing a new study, entitled "Measuring Up: Research and Development Counts in the Chemical Industry," which, for the first time, quantifies the return on investment in chemical research and development.
